features.signature_text:
Beach is Bruce Bay on West Coast New Zealand. Hills are Tararuas in Wellington Region, NZ.

Hello!

collectible.name: Scarcity Mining Club - Pickaxe
collectible.description: When ye need to mine for somethin' rare n' fine, pick dig n' pick, losin' track of yer time...
collectible.author: 0xb7d3a787a39f25457ca511dc3f0591b546f5e02f

collectible.name: The Lost Gnomes Lamp
collectible.description:
When new Scarcity residents got to the island, they started finding hints of a lost gnome civilization, but no sights of gnomes themselves. What happened to them?

This lamp should aid in looking for discoveries throughout the winter.

1 lamp will be airdropped to each current resident, with a small reserve left for new residents or awards. 7.5% of secondary sales go towards planting trees in the real world! Let's see how many we can plant in the new year.

~ Happy Solstice 2021! ~
collectible.author: 0xb7d3a787a39f25457ca511dc3f0591b546f5e02f
